pages.text: The $(item)Logistics Wand$() lets you designate containers for automated item management.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Shift+Scroll$() — Cycle wand mode (Input / Output / Storage)$(li)$(bold)Shift+Right-click$() container — Tag it with current mode$(li)$(bold)Shift+Right-click$() tagged container — Remove tag$(br2)When holding the wand, tagged containers show colored outlines and floating labels:$(br2)$(#5599FF)Blue$() = Input$(br)$(#FF8800)Orange$() = Output$(br)$(#55FF55)Green$() = Storage
